resources.string: Congrats! You\'ve got a new badge!

Welcome to quiz!

As a loyal user of Digital Fish Market, today you have the opportunity to win new badge if you answer all the questions correctly.

Good luck!
Quiz is finished. The number of correct answers is

.\n\nSorry, you didn\'t answer all the questions correctly and you don\'t get a badge. Please try again next time.
